			{

		"stat2"    "50"
	}

"OnProjectileHitUnit"
{
	"DeleteOnHit"	"1"
	"RunScript"
	{
	    "ScriptFile"    "game_mechanics.lua"
	    "Function"      "DamageUnit"
	    "damage"			"0.0"
	    "spelldamagefactor"	"0.0"
	    "attributefactor"	"0"
	    "includeauto"	"100"
	}
}

"Modifiers"
{
	"modifier_pathbuff_108"
	{
		"Passive"  "1"
  		"IsHidden"  "1"
  		"Properties"{
  			"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT"	"%stat2"
		}
		"ThinkInterval"  "1.0"
		"OnIntervalThink"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"game_mechanics.lua"
				"Function"		"ClosestBuff"
				"buff"			"modifier_shoot_arrow_108"
				"dur" 			"0.25"
				"range"			"900"
			}
		}
	}
	"modifier_shoot_arrow_108"
	{
		"Passive"			"0"
		"IsHidden"			"1"
		"IsDebuff"			"0"
	
		"OnCreated"
		{
			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"		"Hero_Windrunner.Attack"
				"Target"			"CASTER"
			}
			"TrackingProjectile"
			{
				"Target"           "TARGET"
			    "EffectName"       "particles/units/heroes/hero_enchantress/enchantress_base_attack.vpcf"
			    "Dodgeable"        "1"
			    "ProvidesVision"   "1"
			    "VisionRadius"     "300"
			    "MoveSpeed"        "1350"
			    "SourceAttachment"  "DOTA_PROJECTILE_ATTACHMENT_ATTACK_1"
			}
		}
	}
}
}

	    "AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
	    "AbilityTextureName" "item_chaosshield2"

	    "ItemPermanent" "1"
	    "ItemDisassembleRule" "DOTA_ITEM_DISASSEMBLE_ALWAYS"

	    "AbilitySpecial"
	    {
	        "01"
	        {
	            "var_type"      "FIELD_INTEGER"
	            "bonus_stat1"    "750"
	        }
	    }

	    "Modifiers"
	    {
	        "modifier_chaosshield2"
	        {
	            "Passive"  "1"
	            "IsHidden" "1"
	            "OnDealDamage"
	            // "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value after mitigation
	            {
	            	"RunScript"
			    	{
			    		"ScriptFile"	"game_mechanics.lua"
			    		"Function"		"ApplyBuffStack"
			    		"max"			"100"
			    		"buff"			"modifier_cs_buff"
			    		"self"			"1"
			    		"dur"			"3"
			    	}
	            }
	        }
	        "modifier_cs_buff"
	        {
	        	"Passive"			"0"
	        	"IsHidden"			"0"
	        	"IsDebuff"			"0"
	        	"OnCreated"
	        	{
	        		"AttachEffect"
	        		{
	        			"EffectName"        "particles/econ/items/underlord/underlord_ti8_immortal_weapon/underlord_ti8_immortal_pitofmalice_stun_base.vpcf"
	        			"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
	        			"Target"            "TARGET"
	        		}
	        	}
	        	"Properties"
	        	{

	        	{

			        }

					{
					    "ScriptFile"    "ragesystem.lua"
					    "Function"      "AddComboPoints"
					    "amount"		"1"
					    //"fixbufficon"	"1"
					}
	            }
	            "OnAttackLanded"
	            // "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
	            {
	            	"Random"
	            	{
	            		"Chance"			"20"
	            		"OnSuccess"
	            		{
	            			"ApplyModifier"
					        {
					            "Target"       "CASTER"
					            "ModifierName" "modifier_combopoint"
					        }
					        "RunScript"
							{
							    "ScriptFile"    "ragesystem.lua"
							    "Function"      "AddComboPoints"
							    "amount"		"1"
							    //"fixbufficon"	"1"
							}
	            		}
	            	}
	            	
	            }
	        }

			{
			    "Duration"         "-1"
			    "Passive"          "0"

	            	{
	            		"Chance"			"10"

			            		"ScriptFile"	"game_mechanics.lua"

			            	}

			                {
			                	"ScriptFile"	"game_mechanics.lua"
			                	"Function"		"ItemProc"
			                	"proc"			"stun"
			                }  
	            		}
	            	}
	            }
	        }

	    "SecretShop"   "1"

	    "ItemStackable" "0"
	    "ItemPermanent" "1"
	    "ItemDisassembleRule" "DOTA_ITEM_DISASSEMBLE_ALWAYS"
	    "AbilityDamage"           "0"
		"AbilityManaCost"         "0"
		"AbilityCooldown"         "5"

	    "AbilitySpecial"
	    {
	        "01"
	        {
	            "var_type"      "FIELD_INTEGER"
	            "bonus_stat1"    "250"
	        }
	        "01"
	        {
	            "var_type"      "FIELD_INTEGER"
	            "bonus_stat2"    "15"
	        }
	        "01"
	        {
	            "var_type"      "FIELD_INTEGER"
	            "bonus_stat3"    "30"
	        }
	    }

	    "OnSpellStart"
	    {
	    	"RunScript"
			{
			    "ScriptFile"    "game_mechanics.lua"
			    "Function"      "CainSetGiveLife"
			    "count"			"2"
			}
			"FireEffect"
			{
				"EffectName"        "particles/econ/items/wisp/wisp_death_ti7.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
				"Target"            "TARGET"
			}
			"FireSound"
        	{
        		"EffectName"	"DOTA_Item.ClarityPotion.Activate"
        		"Target" 		"TARGET"
        	}
	    }

	    "Modifiers"
	    {
	        "modifier_cain_set"
	        {
	            "Passive"  "1"
	            "IsHidden" "1" 
	            "Properties"
	            {
	            	"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS" "%bonus_stat2"
	                "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS" "%bonus_stat3" 
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

	    {

	    	{
	    		"ModifierName"	"modifier_invisible"
	    		"Target" 		"CASTER"
	    		"Duration"		"6"
	    	}
	    }

	    "Modifiers"
	    {
	        "modifier_item_set_t4_panther"
	        {
	            "Passive"  "1"
	            "IsHidden" "1" 
	            "ThinkInterval"  "3"
	            "OnIntervalThink"
	            {
	            	"RunScript"
					{
					    "ScriptFile"    "game_mechanics.lua"
					    "Function"      "CompanionAI"
					    "dragon"			"1"
					    "fight"				"1"
					}
	            }
	            "OnDealDamage"
	            {
	            	"RunScript"
					{
					    "ScriptFile"    "game_mechanics.lua"
					    "Function"      "CompanionTargetSet"
					}
	            }
	            "OnDestroy"
	            {
	            	"RunScript"
					{
					    "ScriptFile"    "game_mechanics.lua"
					    "Function"      "CompanionRemoval"
					}
	            }
	        }
	        "dragon_summon_proc"
	        { 
	        	"Duration"	"0.05"
	        	"Passive"    "0"
	            "IsPurgable" "0"
	        	"IsBuff"	"0"

	            "IsHidden" "1"

			    {

					{

							}

								"Target"            "TARGET"
							}
						}
					}
			    }
	        }
	        "modifier_companion_behavior"
	        {
	        	"Duration"			"-1"
	        	"Passive"			"0"

	        	"IsDebuff"			"0"

	        	}

						"ControlPointEntities"
						{
							"CASTER"	"attach_origin"
							"CASTER"	"attach_origin"
						}
					}
					"ApplyModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_innercd_ashbringer4"
						"Target" 		"CASTER"
					}
	            }
	        } 
	        "modifier_innercd_ashbringer4"
			{
			    "Passive"          "0"    

			    "IsDebuff"         "1"
			    "IsHidden"         "1"
			    "IsPurgable"       "0"
			    
			}
	    }
	}

	    "AbilityTextureName" "item_wind_waker"

	    {
	        "01"
	        {
	            "var_type"      "FIELD_INTEGER"
	            "bonus_stat1"    "25"
	        }
	        "01"
	        {
	            "var_type"      "FIELD_INTEGER"
	            "bonus_stat2"    "25"
	        }
	        "01"
	        {
	            "var_type"      "FIELD_INTEGER"
	            "bonus_stat3"    "25"
	        }
	    }

	    "Modifiers"
	    {
	        "modifier_aaa2"
	        {
	            "Passive"  "1"
	            "IsHidden" "1"
	            "Properties"
	            {
	            	"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEATTACK_BONUSDAMAGE" "%bonus_stat1"
	            	"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT" "%bonus_stat2"
	            	"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_EVASION_CONSTANT" "%bonus_stat3"
	            }
	            "OnAttackStart"
			    {
			        "RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"game_mechanics.lua"
						"Function"		"AutoAttackCriticalStrike"
						"aacrit_factor"	"250"
						"aacrit_chance"	"10"
					}
			    }
	        }
	        "system_aacrit"
			{	
				"Duration"	"5"
			    "IsHidden"  "1"
			    "Properties"
			    {
			        "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_CRITICALSTRIKE" "1" //3500
			    }

			    "OnAttackLanded"
			    {
			        "RemoveModifier"
			        {
			            "ModifierName"  "system_aacrit"
			            "Target"    "CASTER"    
			        }

			        // Basic blood particle effect
			        "RunScript"
					{
					    "ScriptFile"    "game_mechanics.lua"
					    "Function"      "BloodArcana"
					}
			    }
			} 
	    }
	}
